title: National Museum
description: Want to learn about the country’s history, it’s people, culture and art then this is aplace you can start with

title: Railway Museum
description: Displays the relics and records of the railways of East Africa

title: Giraffe Center
description: This breeding and conservation centre educates about the endangered Rothschild's giraffe

title: David Sheldrick Trust Elephant Orphan Centre
description: The orphanage caters for the welfare of orphaned Elephants and Rhinos
location: KWS Central Workshop Gate, Magadi Rd, Nairobi

title: Nairobi Arboretum
description: Provides a quiet peaceful place for city residents looking to escape the city hustle and bustle
location: Offers a great space for walks, picnics and events

title: Gp Karting
description: Turn up at the recently resurfaced track for a day filled with fun and speed

title: Maasai ostrich farm
description: You will not only enjoy a taste of Ostrich meat but you will also get a chance to ride on Ostrich
location: Enkasiti Rd, Off Nairobi – Namanga Rd, Kitengela, Kenya

title: Oloolua Nature Trail
description: Provides a quiet peaceful place for city residents looking to escape the city hustle and bustle

title: Nairobi national park
description: A unique ecosystem by being the only protected area in the world close to a capital city

title: Giraffe Manor
description: A unique boutique hotel celebrated for its exceptional hospitality and the presence of resident Rothschild's giraffes freely roaming the surrounding sanctuary
